meta.name: description
meta.content: Spartanburg County School District #6 serves K-12th grade students and is located in Roebuck, SC.

li.a: What Should My Child Be Learning

img.h1: Spartanburg County School District Six Home

video.alt: This video shows students graduating, learning and having fun!

article.aria-label: SC Governor Henry McMaster Extends Distance Learning for the Remaining School Year

h3.a: SC Governor Henry McMaster Extends Distance Learning for the Remaining School Year

div.div: Schools will continue with Distance Learning

article.aria-label: D6 Provides Meal Service During Mandated School Closure

img.alt: Same info in the body of the message

h3.a: D6 Provides Meal Service During Mandated School Closure

article.aria-label: D6 Offers Wi-Fi Access to Students

img.alt: District logo on a graphic with the same info that is in the article

h3.a: D6 Offers Wi-Fi Access to Students

div.div: We know that some of our families are without internet access. As a way to assist parents and students during this time, District Six has created wi-fi hot spots in all of our school parking lots.

img.alt: 4K flyer information that is all included in the article.

div.div: If your child turns 4 years old by September 1st, 2020 he or she may qualify for our 4K program. Click the article for more information.

section.p: Spartanburg School District Six does not discriminate on the basis of race, age, sex, color, religion, national origin, immigrant status, English speaking status, veteran status or disability in the provision of educational opportunities and benefits. The Deputy Superintendent for Personnel and Operations (Title VI, VII, and IX) and the Assistant Superintendent for Student Services (Section 504, ADA) have been designated to receive inquiries regarding discrimination policies and procedures at (864) 576-4212, 1390 Cavalier Way, Roebuck, SC - 29376
